Text:
YIFY, you've hit my top three list of uploaders.  Kudos for size and quality ration, second to none.

I don't know if you do requests but I've been wanting to get my hands on a decent quality The Replacements (2000) with  Keanu Reeves.  Any chance you make that happen?
YIFY, thanks for the Hitchcock films!  Scored by Bernard Herrmann, might I add... classic!!
wow, thanks so much! glad someone's FINALLY put out a decent rip of this! great job!
